Pre-Game Insights: Barring any late injuries, Brazil’s starting XI is: Ederson; Vanderson, Marquinhos, Gabriel Magalhaes, Abner; Bruno Guimaraes, Gerson, Rodrygo; Savinho, Raphinha, Igor Jesus.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gabriel Martinelli is set to miss Brazil’s World Cup qualifier against Peru on Tuesday evening due to a calf injury.
Others: Brazil currently sit fourth in their World Cup qualifying table after nine games, six points behind leaders Argentina.
Arsenal, meanwhile, must now wait to see the extent of Martinelli’s injury as their Premier League campaign resumes this Saturday with a trip to Bournemouth.
